entry.title: Future Blog Post
entry.content: This post will show up by default. To disable scheduling of future posts, edit config.yml and set future: false.
entry.summary: This post will show up by default. To disable scheduling of future posts, edit config.yml and set future: false.

entry.title: Blog Post number 4
entry.content:

Aren’t headings cool?
